content_reward.en: Congratulations on discovering a new block

content_filter_1.zh_CN: 平均每分钟通过的初筛值：

content_filter_2.zh_CN: 当前一小时通过的初筛值：

content_filter_3.zh_CN: 上一小时通过的初筛值：

content_point.en: Abnormal farming power: There has been a significant decrease passed filter in the current hourly compared to the previous hour. It is recommended to perform a check for confirmation.
content_point.zh_CN: 算力异常：当前一小时通过的初筛值较上一个小时出现了明显下降，建议进行检查确认！

content_offline.en:
The machine may have been disconnected, please check and confirm.  
Possible situations include:  
1, The machine has stopped working due to malfunctions or power outage.  
2, Network disconnection.
content_offline.zh_CN:
机器可能已经掉线，请检查确认。  
可能情况有：  
1、机器因故障或者停电等原因已经停止工作；  
2、断网。

content_offline_error.en:
The machine may have been disconnected, please check and confirm.  
Possible situation: The program has encountered an unknown error and stopped running.
content_offline_error.zh_CN:
机器可能已经掉线，请检查确认。 
可能情况为：程序出现未知错误而停止运行。

err_serve.en: Connection to the remote push service has failed. Disconnection notifications and email notifications will not work. Please check if the remote push service is functioning properly.
err_serve.zh_CN: 连接远程推送服务失败，掉线通知及Email推送将不会工作，请检查远程推送的服务是否正常。

content_sync.en: The full node is detected to be out of sync. Please check and confirm.
content_sync.zh_CN: 检测到全节点未同步，请检查确认。

title_sync_ok.en: The full node has successfully resumed synchronization.

title_server_fail.en: Failed to connect to the remote server.
title_server_fail.zh_CN: 与远程服务器连接失败

content_server_fail.en: Failed to connect to the remote server. Please be aware that features relying on the remote server may be ineffective, such as disconnection notifications and email notifications.
content_server_fail.zh_CN: 与远程服务器连接失败, 请留意！ 依赖远程服务器的功能可能无效，比如：掉线通知、邮件通知。

title_temperature.en: The hard drive temperature is abnormal.

content_temperature.en: Detected abnormal temperatures in some hard drives. Please check and confirm:
content_temperature.zh_CN: 检测到部分硬盘温度异常，请检查确认：

content_try.en: This is a test notification sent at the start of program initialization. It appears that the program is running smoothly, and the notification channel is functioning properly!
content_try.zh_CN: 这是程序开始运行时推送的一条测试通知，看起来程序运行正常，并且推送通道也正常！
